Articles.Content:
I'm not sure if this has been suggested before, or ever how to search for it to see, but I had a great idea while playing tonight.

My problem with the in-game node info is that it always calculates based on the last throttle level used. But usually while I'm doing some wizardry with the node, I will forget where the throttle was, so the estimated burn time number is typically useless for me, and I have to do the math by hand (ugh).

Squad should add a small pip, or some other GUI element to show you where the throttle was right before you last hit 'X'

what do you guys think?
